content: bluebutton.cms.gov 1200 orgs playing. synthetic data for 30,000k beneficiaries
"Validating Entity" ... risk aggregator? (folks won't say the dirty word: "insurance company")
(my thing is smart contracts. That's the way I'd like to see scalable governance addressed. But simple-ish policy data structures understood by large communities of practice are hard to beat.)
oh... the advogato trust metric could let the app community do p2p validation
